title: I feel really bad for fizz mains and all of us unaware
body:
https://imgur.com/a/F4dKWAF

This skin is Pug'maw level of abomination. I didnt know it was fizz untill someone told me because its so unrecognizable and the worst part is: 
there will be a whole skin line of this so your beloved champion might become THIS. Riot please what are you doing ? This is going too far. Its not cute or cool. Its just creepy and ugly.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Foucz,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-27T13:50:42.518+0000)
> 
> This skin is Pug&#039;maw level of abomination.

That's the point.

While this is absolutely true, I'm a little worried about the skin as it seems rather...hard to tell that it's Fizz. Maybe it's just the back animation but when I show this to people they're a little confused by it being Fizz.

But yeah, abomination champ skin.

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainMårvelous,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-27T23:01:32.056+0000)
>
> While this is absolutely true, I'm a little worried about the skin as it seems rather...hard to tell that it's Fizz. Maybe it's just the back animation but when I show this to people they're a little confused by it being Fizz.
> 
> But yeah, abomination champ skin.

Well what about the trident lmao

Isn't that normal?
I see dogs with Tridents all the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Slythrin Umbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2019-01-28T01:17:38.588+0000)
>
> Isn't that normal?
> I see dogs with Tridents all the time.

I should start going outside more.

True, but we've only seen a preview of the recall, things like walking with the trident, his walking animation, size and all that will help. I wish they'd have more fun with skins, the toy series, pizza delivery Sivir and stuff are only april fools skins but Beekeeper Signed is a great example of good imagination and fun, of course the recall of that one is all kinds of nightmare fuel.
I don't. They play Fizz.

>This skin is Pug'maw level of abomination.

The champ itself is on its whole new tier of abomination so it fits well

Waited 2 years for a fizz skin. Was super excited since Omega Squad Fizz was super good.

Saw this. Not happy. Very mad.

> [{quoted}](name=XxDRAGONsAK47xX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-01-27T17:27:28.003+0000)
>
> Waited 2 years for a fizz skin. Was super excited since Omega Squad Fizz was super good.
> 
> Saw this. Not happy. Very mad.

Not every skin is going to be a winner.

Rito this is just another one of there funny jokes guys don't worry its all gonna be over soon 

~~ as a fizz min myself I can't wait for an actual skin to come out~~

Just wait for Aurelion Pug!

https://i.giphy.com/media/14riqedJbuMIDu/giphy.gif
he was made 20 years ago, give him some slack XD
This skin is horrible. JS.

Its a good thing fizz already has some nice skins already, as that one is trash.

It looks like a fanmade custom skin, hell i'd rather [ snoop dogg nasus ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vnY4_6IcTAQ) than this.
Dw, as a fizz main Id take the skin if Riot finally made him a strong pick again

> [{quoted}](name=Fízz v2,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-01-27T14:54:54.932+0000)
>
> Dw, as a fizz main Id take the skin if Riot finally made him a strong pick again

lol, fizz not being strong, lol. go away.
Ew riot. When did furries become their kink
Fizz is a Yordle.  He's a furry regardless of this skin.

are yordles an amorphous species or does he wear some kind of fish suit?  Gnar is a yordle but he was frozen in ice from ancient times

tristana, teemo, rumble:  yordles

fizz:  not or barely a yordle

Fizz was originally a separate species.

But was retconned into a yordle.

So yeah considering they change shape and personality based on where they are, id say theyre just amorphous.

seems pretty odd

wish they'd stop rewriting everything

> [{quoted}](name=ApollyonBainer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2019-01-27T18:24:18.576+0000)
>
> Ew riot. When did furries become their kink

Were you not there when they made Vastayans a thing?
I dont even know what a vastayan is bud

I don't care about the dogs vs. cats event.

What I do care about is that I waited nearly two years for a skin and it seems to be a 750  that doesn't thematically line up with Fizz at all. It doesn't even look like him. And thanks to his rigging, he'd be an upright dog. Unless its an 1820 skin so that they can change how he moves so he carries it in his mouth which is somehow even worse, because it LOOKS terrible and quickly slapped together.  

I'm also worried because this is one of several skins because it's an implied line; and if this is the "best foot forward" they chose to use, the entire line is probably really sloppy/doesn't resemble the champions they're meant to or don't fit their riggings or thematic. As in, if this is the representation in a promotional video, how low quality are the other skins in the line?

He already has an April Fools skin. Why another joke skin? It means I'll have to wait another two years for him to be part of a cool, themed skin line.

Very disappointed.

> [{quoted}](name=Wayward Fish,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-01-27T17:15:58.081+0000)
>
> I don't care about the dogs vs. cats event.
> 
> What I do care about is that I waited nearly two years for a skin and it seems to be a 750  that doesn't thematically line up with Fizz at all. It doesn't even look like him. And thanks to his rigging, he'd be an upright dog. Unless its an 1820 skin so that they can change how he moves so he carries it in his mouth which is somehow even worse, because it LOOKS terrible and quickly slapped together.  
> 
> I'm also worried because this is one of several skins because it's an implied line; and if this is the "best foot forward" they chose to use, the entire line is probably really sloppy/doesn't resemble the champions they're meant to or don't fit their riggings or thematic. As in, if this is the representation in a promotional video, how low quality are the other skins in the line?
> 
> He already has an April Fools skin. Why another joke skin? It means I'll have to wait another two years for him to be part of a cool, themed skin line.
> 
> Very disappointed.

you have fuzz fizz as your pfp tho {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
It's a 1350.  It has a whole new model and recall.

And from what I can see here, it's not worth 1350.

But maybe they will prove me wrong.

It has a new model and new recall, from what we can see here.  That's what qualifies a skin as 1350.

So from what I can see it's worth 1350.
I understand that it fits the criteria, but it doesn't have the quality.

Next up:
-Anthro lux 
-Male Soraka
-Bus driver Sejuani
-Tidal Wave Brand

tidal wave brand is basically firefighter tristana XD

ironically, firefighter brand sounds like a much better idea

I mean rito please make a actual good skin like this for example is better than this abomination mutt

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gtZMH-AS6Nw

>there will be a whole skin line of this so your beloved champion might become THIS. Riot please what are you doing ? This is going too far. Its not cute or cool. Its just creepy and ugly.

I think it's hilarious and awesome. 

God forbid riot makes skins that deviate from the norm every now and then.
except they're deviating from the norm by...appealing to the norm with pet themed skins?

how many pet themed skins do we have in league of legends? 

How many "the champion but cooler" or "the champion but with a cool twist" skins do we have in the game?

how many pet themed everythings are there?

it's cute, but it's relatively a waste of money for what they could do
Wtf does that even mean? There's like, 2 pet themed skins in league.

in league and that's currently

pet themed stuff is a money grab in almost every company ever

sure a dog themed skin is kind of cute, even cool, but fizz is fizz, not a dog.  If they wanted to do pet themed things, they could make pet themed champions, have better synergy with them and a much larger variety to work with...

instead we'll probably get something like cat ear ahri, maybe even Neko Neeko

newsflash, every skin riot releases is a money grab. 

Kog'Maw isn't a dog and yet we have Pug'Maw. Pantheon isn't a baker and yet we have baker pantheon. Sivir isn't a delivery person and yet we have pizza delivery sivir. Screw off with your boring ass ideas about what skins can be. 

Give me puppy fizz and kitty gnar (or something), please.
I stopped playing fizz after riot reworked him for the 30th time

_Sigh_
I hoped for a technology based VS event after having 2 high fantasy thematics.

And now instead we get the eternal "what is the better pet" fight. Hope next year the VS event gives me what I am looking for.
Fuck this Instagram shit, I am out.
Cotton tail fizz is enough for fizz troll skins... please make snowday fizz with a snowboard instead of this...
this is nowhere near as bad as pug maw. there's very few things as bad as pug maw.
It's fucking adorable.

All I know is cats better fucking win.  Dogs suck.  They're stupid, they stink, they will literally eat baby feces out of a potty (I watched my friend's dog do this when he was potty training his son), they're just naturally disgusting creatures.  Cats better fucking win.

> [{quoted}](name=Akheteru,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=pzlwow6R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-27T13:54:43.040+0000)
>
> All I know is cats better fucking win.  Dogs suck.  They're stupid, they stink, they will literally eat baby feces out of a potty (I watched my friend's dog do this when he was potty training his son), they're just naturally disgusting creatures.  Cats better fucking win.

Cats eat baby birds.

the sad thing is you cannot say anything bad about cats that dogs dont do.
dogs also chase small animals, dogs can also hock up puke, dogs also drink from the toilet
whats next?
Furballs, and Toxoplasmosis are pretty unique to cats.
